text: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 1631 was adopted on October 27, 1961 to admit Mauritania to membership in the United Nations. The resolution was adopted by a majority of 68 members with 13 opposing, 20 abstaining and Cyprus didn't vote. == Voting Results == The result of the voting was the following: {| class="sortable
